languages.text: "Прискорбная необходимость. Иногда мне нужно разговаривать с тебе подобными — когда языка плети оказывается недостаточно".

traits.locale_text: "Прискорбная необходимость. Иногда мне нужно разговаривать с тебе подобными — когда языка плети оказывается недостаточно".

languages.text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."
languages.original_text: "Прискорбная необходимость. Иногда мне нужно разговаривать с тебе подобными — когда языка плети оказывается недостаточно".

traits.locale_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I find myself in need of speaking to the likes of you — when the words of a whip do not suffice."
"An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I find myself in need of speaking to the likes of you — when the words of a whip do not suffice."
"An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."
"An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."
"An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

languages.text: «Una necesidad lamentable. A veces me veo obligado a hablar con los de tu ralea cuando el látigo no basta».
languages.original_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

traits.locale_text: «Una necesidad lamentable. A veces me veo obligado a hablar con los de tu ralea cuando el látigo no basta».

languages.text: “很遗憾，我不得不学。有时候，当鞭子不足以传达我的意思时，我不得不对你们这样的东西开口。”
languages.original_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我不得不学。有时候，当鞭子不足以传达我的意思时，我不得不对你们这样的东西开口。”

languages.text: 「不幸にも必要に応じて学ぶことになった。鞭が効かない時は、お前たちのような下等種族と話さざるを得ないのでね」
languages.original_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

traits.locale_text: 「不幸にも必要に応じて学ぶことになった。鞭が効かない時は、お前たちのような下等種族と話さざるを得ないのでね」

languages.text: "Eine unerquickliche Notwendigkeit. Manchmal sehe ich mich gezwungen, mit Euresgleichen zu sprechen – wenn die Eloquenz der Peitsche nicht ausreicht."
languages.original_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

traits.locale_text: "Eine unerquickliche Notwendigkeit. Manchmal sehe ich mich gezwungen, mit Euresgleichen zu sprechen – wenn die Eloquenz der Peitsche nicht ausreicht."

languages.original_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

languages.text: « C'est une regrettable nécessité. Je suis parfois contraint de parler à des individus de votre acabit, lorsque l'éloquence du fouet se révèle insuffisante. »
languages.original_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une regrettable nécessité. Je suis parfois contraint de parler à des individus de votre acabit, lorsque l'éloquence du fouet se révèle insuffisante. »

languages.text: "Maalesef öğrenmek zorunda kaldım. Zaman zaman kırbaçların dilinden anlamayanlar oluyor. Sizin gibilerle konuşmak mecburiyetine düşüyorum."
languages.original_text: "An unfortunate necessity. Sometimes I am forced to speak to the likes of you — when the eloquence of the whip does not suffice."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef öğrenmek zorunda kaldım. Zaman zaman kırbaçların dilinden anlamayanlar oluyor. Sizin gibilerle konuşmak mecburiyetine düşüyorum."
